title: Video Analysis Results
rulesDescription: A set of rules has been generated to ensure consistent transcription for this video.
autoSelectCountdown: Auto-selecting recommended preset in (click anywhere to cancel)
autoSelectRecommendedCountdown: Auto-selecting recommended preset in (click anywhere to cancel)

noVideoFile: No video file available for analysis. Please upload or download a video first.
